channel.title: brain tumour on AJTRE
channel.description: Recent content in brain tumour on AJTRE

item.title: Automatic Brain Tumour Regions Segmentation Using Modified U-Net
item.description: Early diagnosis is an important key for brain tumour patients' survival. The segmentation of the tumour regions is done manually by the experts and it is time-consuming. In this work, we present a novel network architecture that automatically segments the whole tumour regions and intra-tumour structures (edema, enhancing tumour, necrotic and non-enhancing tumour). We evaluated the results using dice similarity coefficient and obtained promising results. * corresponding author (keerati.
